title: Sue Monk Kidd makes the wife of Jesus her next novel character
text: Sue Monk Kidd makes the wife of Jesus her next novel character By Sue Gilmore Posted: 10/08/2015 11:50:14 AM   04:27:13 PM PDT Sue Monk Kidd, author of the best-sellers "The Secret Life of Bees" and "The Invention of Wings," has quite the novel character narrating her next work of fiction. "Ana, the Wife of Jesus," to be published by Viking Penguin at an undetermined future date, will revolve around a "devout yet rebellious young woman" who first encounters an 18-year-old Jesus, then tells her story of "longing, attachment, separation, exile and reunion" that covers their life for the next dozen years. -- Sue Gilmore, Staff
